Package rpg.battle

Class Fight

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.battle.Fight
  • public class Fight
extends java.lang.Object
    Fight Class.

    Controls the course of the fight, calling appropriate methods on Dice, Player and Computer Objects as well as returning results when nescessary.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fight

        public Fight​(Player player)
        Constructor.

        Builds an instance of fight with provided Player Character and building dice and instance of Player to Function As Computer.

        Parameters:
        player - MyCharacter Instance representing the player

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public java.lang.String attack()
        Performs an attack for the player and calls computer's responce.

        Calls functions in and modifies player and computer attributes to simulate attack performed.

        Returns:
        String result of both player and computer actions

      • defend

        public java.lang.String defend()
        Performs defense action for the player and calls computer's responce.

        Calls functions in and modifies player and computer attributes to simulate defense performed.

        Returns:
        String result of both player and computer actions

      • computerAction

        public java.lang.String computerAction()
        Performs an action for the computer.

        Calls functions in and modifies player and computer attributes to simulate action performed by the computer.The computer will attempt an attack unless it is out of stamina, in which case, it will rest. (calling resetStamina and heal functions)

        Returns:
        String result of computer action

      • rollForPlayerAttackSuccess

        public boolean rollForPlayerAttackSuccess()
        Rolls to see if player attack successful.

        Rolls die and applies hit chance and stamina modifiers, getting a total which is checked against the computer's defense roll.

        Returns:
        boolean result of attack, hit or miss

      • rollForComputerAttackSuccess

        public boolean rollForComputerAttackSuccess()
        Rolls to see if computer attack successful.

        Rolls die and applies hit chance and stamina modifiers, getting a total which is checked against the player's defense roll.

        Returns:
        boolean result of attack, hit or miss

      • rollForPlayerDefense

        public int rollForPlayerDefense()
        Rolls for players defensive capability.

        Rolls die and applies defense and stamina modifiers, getting a total which is returned to the computer's attack roll.

        Returns:
        int result of dice roll and stat modifiers

      • rollForComputerDefense

        public int rollForComputerDefense()
        Rolls for computers defensive capability.

        Rolls die and applies defense and stamina modifiers, getting a total which is returned to the player's attack roll.

        Returns:
        int result of dice roll and stat modifiers

      • checkIfOver

        public boolean checkIfOver()
        Checks to see if the fight is over.

        Finds out if either player or computer has zero health left.

        Returns:
        boolean over or not

      • killComputer

        public void killComputer()
        Sets Computer Health to Zero.

        This Method is for testing purposes only.

      • exhaustComputer

        public void exhaustComputer()
        Sets Computer Stamina to Zero.

        This Method is for testing purposes only.

      • getResultOfGame

        public java.lang.String getResultOfGame()
        Gets the result of the game.

        Finds the winning party and returns an appropriate statement, or, in case of a draw, gives the tragic news.

        Returns:
        String result of the game

      • randomEnemy

        public static Player randomEnemy()
        Selects a random enemy for the computer to be.

        Chooses at random from preset array of possible enemies.

        Returns:
        Player enemy chosen
